articles.author: Lynn Brown
articles.title: The big change affecting US air travel - BBC
articles.description: Starting tomorrow, many American citizens and residents will need a new form of ID to board domestic flights.
articles.content:
Travellers should prepare for longer airport screening lines as REAL IDs roll out across the US (Credit: Alamy)
